title: Just to be clear...this is what Star Guardian Lux is based on.
body:
https://latimesherocomplex.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/sm_sailormoon_05-0.jpg

According to recent moderation actions this picture is grounds for a ban/deletion (2muchlegs4me).
And yet it's the basis of your new and improved "fun-loving Lux skin that the COMMUNITY has been asking for."
Interesting. So the COMMUNITY that consists of GD gets rekt whenever cooties are involved but champion skin design has free reign? Kay.
On a side note mods I wouldn't put an interest in Vespas as "having a rebel streak". Riding a Vespa is like announcing you're into Barbie Dolls. Why not giant muscle cars or Japanese imports? Or if you're financially strapped for cash, a simple skateboard works just fine.
